# Janette Avelar

PhD Candidate (Quantitative Research Methods in Education), University of Oregon • Research Analyst, Center on Reinventing Public Education

I study how race and language shape educational opportunity through policy labels (e.g., English learner classification, TAG identification) and the systems that translate labels into course access and learning experiences. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index="1"}
:::
